publisher.publisher-name: Institute of Computational Mathematices and Scientific/Engineering Computing(ICMSEC) Chinese Academy of Sciences

title-group.article-title: On the United Theory of the Family of Euler-Halley Type Methods with Cubical Convergence in Banach Spaces

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2003 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: The convergence problem of the family of Euler-Halley methods is considered under the Lipschitz condition with the L-average, and a united convergence theory with its applications is presented.
